title: Apple Vision Pro Headset Likely to Launch in March 2024
originSummary: Apple is likely to postpone the release of its Apple Vision Pro mixed reality headset from January to March 2024 due to distribution and testing challenges.
The complex design of the headset has resulted in production cuts, with less than 400,000 units expected to be manufactured in 2024.
Initially, the headset will only be available in the US, with plans to expand to other markets later in the year.
Apple has provided training to select employees at its headquarters in preparation for the launch and is anticipated to promote the headset at its spring event.
The software for the headset, visionOS, is nearing completion, as evidenced by the release of a sixth beta version for developers.

title: Apple's Vision Pro AR headset delayed, expected to launch in March 2024
originSummary: Apple's augmented reality headset, the Vision Pro, is set to release in March 2024, later than anticipated.
The $3,499 headset will initially be sold only in the US and exclusively through Apple retail stores and online.
Unlike previous product launches, customers will have the opportunity to try out demo units before making a purchase.

title: Apple Vision Pro Release Date Reportedly Delayed to March 2024
originSummary: The release of the highly anticipated Apple Vision Pro mixed-reality headset may be delayed to March 2024, according to Bloomberg's Mark Gurman.
The initial release will be in the United States, with plans to expand to other countries by the end of the year.

Apple is taking a cautious approach to the rollout, with dedicated sections in Apple Stores and no third-party resellers, and the complexity of stocking prescription lenses for the headset is a contributing factor. Despite the potential delay, Apple executives are reportedly excited about the product.

title: Unveiling Apple Vision Pro: A Revolutionary Glimpse into the Future
originSummary: Apple is set to release the highly anticipated Apple Vision Pro in March, a product that is speculated to be groundbreaking in its innovation.
The article delves into the purpose, functionality, and features of the device, offering readers an in-depth look at what makes it so revolutionary.

The launch event details and information on how to obtain the Apple Vision Pro are also covered, providing interested individuals with the opportunity to experience the future of technology firsthand.

title: Apple's Vision Pro Mixed-Reality Hardware Set to Launch in March 2024
originSummary: Apple's mixed-reality hardware, Vision Pro, will launch in March 2024, following a delay from the initial expected release in January.
Vision Pro is a highly anticipated product for Apple, with the company aiming for it to eventually replace the iPhone.
The initial launch will be in the U.S. only, with other countries expected to have access later in the year.

title: Apple Set to Launch Vision Pro Headset in March, Potentially Alongside OLED iPad Pro
originSummary: Apple is set to release its Vision Pro headset in March, alongside new OLED iPad Pro models.
The headset will initially be available in the United States and later expand to other regions.
It will be sold exclusively through Apple's retail stores and online, without involving third-party sellers.

title: Delay in Apple's Vision Pro VR Headset Release Suggests March 2024 Launch
originSummary: Black Friday deals are available on phones, such as Samsung Galaxy, Google Pixel, and Motorola devices.
The release of Apple's Vision Pro virtual reality headset may be delayed until March 2024, instead of the previously announced early 2024.
The cause of the delay could be logistical challenges and Apple's search for improved suppliers, indicating a preference for a polished product over an early release.

title: Naver Z's Zepeto Embraces Apple's Vision Pro for Next-Level Evolution
originSummary: Naver Z, the metaverse arm of Naver, plans to bring its popular Zepeto app to Apple's Vision Pro device, embracing spatial computing.
This aligns with Apple's focus on spatial computing and represents a significant development for Zepeto.
Zepeto distinguishes itself by providing users with a dynamic virtual space for interaction and creation, and it has thrived in the current market without relying on virtual reality technology.

title: Apple's Vision Pro headset delayed, now set for March release
originSummary: Apple's Vision Pro mixed-reality headset is now slated to ship in March, rather than the original January 2024 release date.
Product onboarding videos found in the latest beta version of visionOS suggest that software teams were preparing for a January launch.

The headset will be initially available exclusively in the United States through Apple's website or retail stores by appointment only, priced at $3,499. Distribution plans for the hardware are still being finalized.

title: Apple Vision Pro US Launch Date Delayed, Coming to Other Countries Later in 2024
originSummary: The founder of Telegram is working on an app called visionOS for the Apple Vision Pro, featuring a transparent design.
Leaked specifications indicate a redesigned rear strap for the Apple Vision Pro 2.
The Samsung XR Headset "Infinite" is set for release in the second half of 2024, following the Apple Vision Pro.
Apple Watch might support blood sugar monitoring and blood pressure trends in the future.
Apple is reportedly developing a more affordable version of the Vision Headset, lacking EyeSight and some sensors.
